defs: a cloud.
a water outlet, for letting out water from a tank.
= ಜಲಪ್ರಳಯ.
a great flood or heavy rainfall.
(myth.) the deluge supposed to annihilate the universe at the time of dissolution.
the waters under the sovereign jurisdiction of a nation or state including both marginal sea and inland waters; territorial waters.
the region along the sea coast.
an aquatic animal.
consisting of, filled with or surrounded by water.
a place or region abounding with water.
any water-snake.
an enclosed part of a canal, waterway, etc. equipped with gates so that the level of the water can be changed to raise or lower boats from one level to another; a lock.
the discomfort, pain caused by not discharging urine.
(loosely) periodical discharge of urine.
the plant Bacopa monnieri (= Herpestis monniera) of Scrophulariaceae family.
a ridge or swell moving along the surface of a body of water as a result of disturbance, as by wind; a wave.

an arc or circle that exhibits in concentric bands the colours of the spectrum and that is formed opposite the sun by the refraction and reflection of the suṇs rays in raindrops, spray or mist; a rainbow.
a cloud, as the bearer of water.
water moving rapidly in a circle so as to produce a depression in the centre into which floating objects may be drawn; a whirlpool.
a mystical hymn chanting of which is supposed to give power to be under the surface of water without breathing.
consisting of, filled with, covered or surrounded by water.
the weed Acalypha indica of Euphorbiaceae family; Indian acalypha.
an imaginary sea creature with the head and upper body of a beautiful woman and the tail of a fish; a mermaid.
the passage by sea through which ships normally sail.
a passage, pipe, through which water is supplied to a building.
any passage for water, as canal, drainage, etc.
contamination of water caused by industrial and domestic effluents into it.
a cloud.

a device consisting of a narrow tube of glass, rubber or metal, with a narrowed outlet and fitted at another end with a rubber bulb or piston by means of which a liquid can be drawn in and then ejected in a stream.
an artificial device for sprinkling water or ejecting it through a jet; a fountain; a sprinkler.
a voyage by sea.
